title: WTB Freeman AB, Cycle, Broadleaf, PB, Drum, or Tolstoi

posts.post_title: WTB Freeman AB, Cycle, Broadleaf, PB, Drum, or Tolstoi
posts.post_content:
Hi there.  I am interested in picking up a less-common-backed Freeman:

American Beauty
Broadleaf
Cycle
Drum 
Polar Bear
Tolstoi (if it exists w/Freeman)

Please email directly to [url]rblamp@email.wm.edu[/url]
Thanks!
- Richard

2nd try... does anyone have one with which he would be willing to part?

Richard
